DarkestMod:Absolution.NAME: Absolution
DarkestMod:Absolution.DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M! and remove 8 darkestmod:Stress. Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Defender.NAME: Defender
DarkestMod:Defender.DESCRIPTION: Apply !B! block this turn and !M! block next turn

DarkestMod:Divine Comfort.NAME: Divine Comfort
DarkestMod:Divine Comfort.DESCRIPTION: Heal yourself and all enemies for !M!

DarkestMod:Rain of Sorrows.NAME: Rain of Sorrows
DarkestMod:Rain of Sorrows.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! darkestmod:Bleed and 2 Vulnerable to all

DarkestMod:Redeem.NAME: Redeem
DarkestMod:Redeem.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when below 40% Max HP. Heal for 25% of Max HP

DarkestMod:Target Whistle.NAME: Target Whistle
DarkestMod:Target Whistle.DESCRIPTION: Apply darkestmod:Marked to an enemy, next turn draw 2 more cards

DarkestMod:Torch.NAME: Torch
DarkestMod:Torch.DESCRIPTION: And apply !B! block, and gain !M! darkestmod:Light

DarkestMod:Weakening Curse.NAME: Weakening Curse
DarkestMod:Weakening Curse.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 stress and target enemy loses 2 Strength and is darkestmod:Marked. Exhaust.

DarkestMod:attackPoisonTest.NAME: POISON
DarkestMod:attackPoisonTest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! darkestmod:Blight to the enemy. Gain NL darkestmod:Stress

DarkestMod:Collect Bounty.NAME: Collect Bounty
DarkestMod:Collect Bounty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is darkestmod:Marked, gain 2 Energy and 2 Strength.

DarkestMod:Finale.NAME: Finale
DarkestMod:Finale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And Exhaust your hand

DarkestMod:GrapeshotBlast.NAME: Grapeshot Blast
DarkestMod:GrapeshotBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Exhaust

DarkestMod:Hound's Harry.NAME: Hound's Harry
DarkestMod:Hound's Harry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! darkestmod:Bleed to all enemies

DarkestMod:Punish.NAME: Punish
DarkestMod:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! darkestmod:Bleed to the enemy

DarkestMod:ThrownDagger.NAME: Thrown Dagger
DarkestMod:ThrownDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !M! darkestmod:Bleed to the enemy. Exhaust

DarkestMod:Abomination.NAME: Abomination
DarkestMod:Abomination.DESCRIPTION: Even Turns gain 2 Temporary Strength. Odd Turns gain 2 Temporary Dexterity. And gain 2 stress each turn

DarkestMod:Antiquarian.NAME: Antiquarian
DarkestMod:Antiquarian.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Frail and at the end of each turn add 1 Antique to your discard pile.

DarkestMod:Crusader.NAME: Crusader
DarkestMod:Crusader.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play and Attack, gain 3 Block

DarkestMod:Flagellant.NAME: Flagellant
DarkestMod:Flagellant.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Temporary Strength when below 50% HP

DarkestMod:GraveRobber.NAME: Grave Robber
DarkestMod:GraveRobber.DESCRIPTION: Add a Thrown Dagger to the hand each turn

DarkestMod:Highwayman.NAME: Highwayman
DarkestMod:Highwayman.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! Grapeshot Blasts into your hand.

DarkestMod:Jester.NAME: Jester
DarkestMod:Jester.DESCRIPTION: Reduce stress by 8 and all incoming stress is reduced by 1.

DarkestMod:Leper.NAME: Leper
DarkestMod:Leper.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn gain 1 Strength for each Debuff.

DarkestMod:AfflictionTemp.NAME: Afflict Test card
DarkestMod:AfflictionTemp.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn Gain !B! block and then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Abusive.NAME: Abusive
DarkestMod:Abusive.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  You cannot gain Block from cards for 3 turns.Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Fearful.NAME: Fearful
DarkestMod:Fearful.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn get 3 Bleed, 3 Blight. Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Hopeless.NAME: Hopeless
DarkestMod:Hopeless.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn shuffle 5 Normalities into the deck then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Paranoid.NAME: Paranoid
DarkestMod:Paranoid.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Become Confused and then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Courageous.NAME: Courageous
DarkestMod:Courageous.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Gain 3 Dexterity and 3 Artifact. Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Focused.NAME: Focused
DarkestMod:Focused.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Gain 3 Intangible and then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Powerful.NAME: Powerful
DarkestMod:Powerful.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn become Gain 5 Strength and then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Stalwart.NAME: Stalwart
DarkestMod:Stalwart.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn heal 100 stress and gain 20 Block. Exhaust.

DarkestMod:Vigorous.NAME: Vigorous
DarkestMod:Vigorous.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  At the end of turn Heal for 50 and then Exhaust.

DarkestMod:attackStrike_s.NAME: Jester
DarkestMod:attackStrike_s.DESCRIPTION: Reduce current stress by 8 and all incoming stress is reduced by 1.

DarkestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
DarkestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

DarkestMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
DarkestMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

DarkestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
DarkestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !darkestmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

DarkestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
DarkestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !darkestmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
